title: Iterator Chains
description:
Practice using iterator adaptors to process data.

## Requirements

1. Implement `sum_of_squares(numbers: &[i32]) -> i32`
   - Square each number and sum them

2. Implement `even_indices(items: &[&str]) -> Vec<String>`
   - Return items at even indices (0, 2, 4, ...)
   - Convert to owned Strings

3. Implement `parse_numbers(strings: &[&str]) -> Vec<i32>`
   - Parse each string to i32
   - Skip any that fail to parse

4. Implement `group_by_first_char(words: &[&str]) -> HashMap<char, Vec<String>>`
   - Group words by their first character (lowercase)
hints: group_by_first_char: use entry().or_default().push() to build the groups
Use .chars().next().map(|c| c.to_ascii_lowercase()) to get first char lowercase
